Detailed Description

SMS class.

This class is used to send a SMS (Short Message Service).

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
Link:
http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
Copyright:
2009 David Singer
Author:
David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
Version:
2.0.1
Required:
http://www.swiftmailer.org/ Swift Mailer (included in BOO_LIB_DIR)
See also:
http://www.swiftmailer.org/wikidocs/

static Boo_Sms::htmlCarrierSelect ( $  sticky = true,
array $  attrs = array() 
) [static]

Returns a HTML drop-down list of carriers.

Parameters:
bool $sticky[optional] If set to TRUE the drop down list will be sticky.
array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes to add to the HTML select.
Returns:
string HTML drop-down list of all avalible carriers.
Since:
2.0.0 Carrier IDs were renumbered.

Definition at line 385 of file Sms.php.

References $select, and getCarrierNames().

static Boo_Sms::htmlCarrierSelect2 ( $  sticky = true  )  [static]

Returns a HTML drop-down list of carriers.

This function is usefull for creating an HTML select of the avalible carriers. The value for each option will be set to the carrier ID. If the selected value is 0 no carrier was chosen from the drop-down list.

This function is not dependent on Boo_Html_Select. If you have the entire Boo Framework installed you should use Boo_Sms::htmlCarrierSelect() instead.

Parameters:
bool $sticky[optional] If set to TRUE the drop down list will be sticky.
Returns:
string HTML drop-down list of all avalible carriers.
Since:
2.0.0 Carrier IDs were renumbered.
 <select name="carrier" id="carrier">
 <option value="0">Select Carrier</option>
 <option value="5">Alaska Communications</option>
 <option value="10">Alltel</option>
 ...
 <option value="100">Virgin Mobile</option>
 </select>

Boo_Sms::send (  ) 

Sends the message. Sends the message. Phone number and carrier ID must be set priory to calling the send method. This function requires Swift.

Returns:
bool Returns TRUE if send was successful, FALSE otherwise.
 $sms->send();
Todo:
Add support for mail() function.
